summary: AWS-certified DevOps Engineer with 3.5+ years of experience in Terraform-managed infrastructure, Jenkins CI/CD, and Kubernetes orchestration. Specialized in building scalable, secure cloud solutions and implementing GitOps practices. Expert in automating deployment pipelines, reducing operational costs, and improving system reliability through infrastructure as code.

responsibilities: Architect and manage scalable AWS infrastructure using services like EC2, EKS, RDS, IAM, ALB, and VPC
Lead deployment automation using Terraform and CloudFormation for multi-account environments
Design and optimize CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, GitHub Actions, and AWS CodePipeline
Implement containerized workloads using Docker and Amazon EKS/ECS with secure IAM roles
Monitor and troubleshoot production workloads using CloudWatch, Prometheus, and Grafana
Manage networking components including VPC peering, Transit Gateway, VPN, and Route 53
Enforce security best practices using IAM policies, Security Groups, GuardDuty, and KMS
Collaborate with development teams to optimize cloud cost, performance, and reliability
Drive incident management, root-cause analysis, and high-availability architecture
Facilitated continuous deployment practices to enhance software delivery speed
Established continuous integration pipelines to automate testing and build processes
Implemented Cosign for container image signing and verification
Adopted and enforced the SLSA framework to secure software supply chains
Managed infrastructure with Terraform, enabling declarative, version-controlled provisioning
Designed and implemented three-tier AWS architecture with disaster recovery and high availability
Automated configuration management and deployment processes using Ansible
achievements: Containerized applications using Docker and deployed to Amazon EKS, improving scalability by 30% and deployment efficiency by 20%
Managed EKS clusters handling 10x traffic spikes and 500 peak requests per second
Reduced Kubernetes cluster operational costs by 18% through rightsizing and efficient resource allocation
Improved audit compliance by 25% through security-focused DevOps practices
Automated vulnerability scanning across 15 applications, reducing manual security review time by 8 hours/week
Reduced critical vulnerabilities in container images by 70% within 3 months using Docker Scout
Improved artifact retrieval speed by 35% and ensured 99.9% availability with Aptly repositories
Reduced manual effort by 10 hours/week through automated repository publishing pipelines
Deployed private Git server with Azure AD SSO for 25 developers, improving login experience
Migrated 30+ repositories with 100% data integrity and zero downtime
Secured 3 new client engagements through detailed SOWs and architectural diagrams
Achieved average cost reductions of 20% for client cloud spend
Improved client satisfaction scores by 20% through DevOps consulting

responsibilities: Facilitated continuous deployment practices to enhance software delivery speed
